context.speaker: Laylo
context.en_line: Hi Akmal! Did you see our new bedroom?

strings.value: Ha, ko'rdim! U juda katta! Nima bor?

context.speaker: Akmal
context.en_line: Yes, I saw it! It's very big! What's there?

context.speaker: Laylo
context.en_line: There are big beds. Two beds!

context.speaker: Akmal
context.en_line: Wonderful! Is there a bookshelf?

strings.value: Ha, devor yonida kitob javoni bor. Va stol ham bor!

context.speaker: Laylo
context.en_line: Yes, there's a bookshelf by the wall. And there's also a desk!

context.speaker: Akmal
context.en_line: Is there a wardrobe? For our clothes?

strings.value: Ha, katta shkaf bor! Va ko'zgu ham bor!

context.speaker: Laylo
context.en_line: Yes, there's a big wardrobe! And there's also a mirror!

context.speaker: Akmal
context.en_line: I love this room!

strings.value: Bu yerda hech narsa eski yo'q. Hammasi yangi!

context.speaker: Laylo
context.en_line: There isn't anything old here. Everything is new!

context.speaker: Akmal
context.en_line: Is there something on the desk?

strings.value: Salom Sardor! Maktabdan keyin nima qilishni yoqtirasiz?

context.speaker: Nodira
context.en_line: Hi Sardor! What do you like to do after school?

strings.value: Men rasm chizish va musiqa tinglashni yaxshi ko'raman.

context.speaker: Sardor
context.en_line: I like to draw pictures and listen to music.

strings.value: Bu ajoyib! Men gitara chalishni yaxshi ko'raman.

context.speaker: Nodira
context.en_line: That's great! I like to play the guitar.

context.speaker: Sardor
context.en_line: Do you like to write stories?

strings.value: Ha, men har kecha kundalik yozaman.

context.speaker: Nodira
context.en_line: Yes, I write a diary every night.

context.speaker: Sardor
context.en_line: Does anyone in your family play music?

strings.value: Ha, mening oilamdagi hamma narsa chaladi!

context.speaker: Nodira
context.en_line: Yes, everyone in my family plays something!

context.speaker: Sardor
context.en_line: I don't have anything to play.

strings.value: Bunda yomon hech narsa yo'q! Siz yaxshi chizasiz.

context.speaker: Nodira
context.en_line: There's nothing wrong with that! You draw well.

strings.value: Rahmat! Men san'at haqida jurnallar ham o'qiyman.

context.speaker: Sardor
context.en_line: Thanks! I read magazines about art too.

strings.value: Salom Ravshan! Ijodiy ish qilishni yoqtirasizmi?

context.speaker: Malika
context.en_line: Hi Ravshan! Do you like to do anything creative?

strings.value: Ha, men rasm chizishni yoqtiraman! Siz-chi?

context.speaker: Ravshan
context.en_line: Yes, I like to draw! What about you?

strings.value: Mening sinimdagi hech kim maktabdan keyin musiqa chalmaydi.

context.speaker: Malika
context.en_line: No one in my class plays music after school.

strings.value: Rostdan? Men musiqada hech qanday yomon narsa ko'rmayapman!

context.speaker: Ravshan
context.en_line: Really? I don't see anything wrong with music!

strings.value: Musiqada yomon hech narsa yo'q. Biz shunchaki boshqa narsalarni afzal ko'ramiz.

context.speaker: Malika
context.en_line: There's nothing wrong with music. We just prefer other things.

strings.value: Bu ajoyib! Sizning oilangizda rasm chizadigan boshqa kimdir bormi?

context.speaker: Malika
context.en_line: That's great! Is there anyone else who draws in your family?

strings.value: Ha, mening singlim bizning yotoq xonasining chiroyli rasmlarini chizadi.

context.speaker: Ravshan
context.en_line: Yes, my sister draws beautiful pictures of our bedroom.

strings.value: Sizning xonangizda hech narsa yo'qmi? Bo'shmi?
Yo'q, bo'sh emas. Xonamda kitob javoni bor.
To'g'ri! 'There is' = mavjudlik bildiradi (biror narsa borligini).
Xato. 'There is' = mavjudlik bildiradi, mulkiyat emas.
Ha, devor yonida kitob javoni bor.
Ingliz tilida ayting: 'Devor yonida kitob javoni bor'
⚠️ Mavjudlik uchun 'THERE IS' kerak ('It is' emas)!
Yo'q, men oshxonada emas. Men yotoq xonasida uxlayman.
Xato. 'Bedroom' = uxlash uchun xona, oshxona emas.
Bizning yotoq xonamizda ikkita kravat bor.
Ingliz tilida ayting: 'Bizning yangi yotoq xonamiz'
Siz kitoblaringizni polda saqlaysizmi? Yerda tashlab qo'yasizmi?
Yo'q, men polda saqlamayman. Men kitob javonida saqlayman.
To'g'ri! 'Bookshelf' = kitob javoni, kitoblar saqlash uchun.
Xato. 'Bookshelf' = kitoblar uchun, yashash uchun emas.
Siz kiyimlaringizni polda saqlaysizmi? Tashlab qo'yasizmi?
Yo'q, men polda saqlamayman. Men shkafda saqlayman.
Xato. 'Wardrobe' = kiyimlar uchun, ovqat uchun emas.
Ingliz tilida ayting: 'Kiyimlar uchun shkaf bormi?'
Stol ustida hech narsa yo'qmi? Bo'shmi?
Yo'q, bo'sh emas. Stol ustida nimadir bor.
To'g'ri! 'Something' = ijobiy fe'llar bilan (there IS, I SEE).
Xato. 'Something' = faqat ijobiy fe'llar bilan ishlatiladi.
Ingliz tilida ayting: 'Stol ustida nimadir bor'
Siz faqat musiqa tinglaysizmi? Boshqa narsa yoqtirmaysizmi?
Yo'q, men boshqa narsalarni ham yoqtiraman.
To'g'ri! 'Like' dan keyin TO + base verb (infinitiv).
Xato. 'Like' dan keyin TO + base verb: 'like TO draw'.
Men rasm chizish va musiqa tinglashni yaxshi ko'raman.
Ingliz tilida ayting: 'Men rasm chizishni yoqtiraman'
⚠️ 'Like' dan keyin TO kerak: 'like TO draw'!
Siz faqat yozasizmi? Boshqa ijodiy ish qilmaysizmi?
Yo'q, men yozishdan tashqari rasm ham chizaman.
To'g'ri! 'Draw' = rasm chizish, qalam yoki rangli qalam bilan.
Biz har dam olish kunlari birga rasm chizamiz.
Siz faqat baraban chalaysizmi? Boshqa asbob bilmaysizmi?
Yo'q, men baraban emas. Men gitara chalayman.
Bu ajoyib! Men gitara chalishni yaxshi ko'raman.
Sizning oilangizda hech kim musiqa chalmaydimi?
Yo'q, hamma chalaadi. Oilamdagi hamma narsa chalaydi.
To'g'ri! 'Everyone' = birlik fe'l: Everyone PLAYS (NOT play).
Xato. 'Everyone' = birlik fe'l: Everyone IS, Everyone PLAYS.
Ha, mening oilamdagi hamma nimadir chaladi!
Sizda chalish uchun nimadir bormi? Gitara, pianino?
Yo'q, menda hech narsa yo'q. Hech narsa.
To'g'ri! 'Anything' = inkor gaplar va savollar bilan.
Xato. 'Anything' = INKOR gaplar bilan, ijobiy bilan emas.
U hech qanday noto'g'ri narsa ko'rmaydi.
Ingliz tilida ayting: 'Menda hech narsa yo'q'
⚠️ Ikki marta inkor! 'don't have ANYTHING' yoki 'have NOTHING'!
Sizning rasmingizda nimadir yomon bormi? Noto'g'ri?
Yo'q, hech narsa yomon yo'q. Hammasi yaxshi.
To'g'ri! 'Nothing' = ijobiy fe'llar bilan (There IS nothing).
Xato. 'Nothing' = ijobiy fe'llar bilan, ikki marta inkor yo'q!
Bunda yomon hech narsa yo'q! Siz yaxshi chizasiz.
Agar harakat qilsang, hech narsa imkonsiz emas.
Ingliz tilida ayting: 'Hech narsa yomon yo'q'
⚠️ Ikki marta inkor! 'There IS nothing' (positive verb)!
Yo'q, mening sifimda hech kim musiqa chalmaydi.
To'g'ri! 'No one' = ijobiy fe'llar bilan (No one PLAYS).
Xato. 'No one' = ijobiy fe'llar bilan, ikki marta inkor yo'q!
Mening sinimdagi hech kim maktabdan keyin musiqa chalmaydi.
Hozir yotoq xonasida hech kim yo'q.
Bizning oilamizda hech kim yozishni yoqtirmaydi.
Ingliz tilida ayting: 'Hech kim bu yerda yo'q'
⚠️ Ikki marta inkor! 'No one IS' (positive verb)!
Siz faqat kitob o'qiysizmi? Gazeta, jurnal o'qimaysizmi?
Yo'q, men kitobdan tashqari jurnal ham o'qiyman.
To'g'ri! 'Magazines' = jurnallar, har oy yoki hafta chiqadigan.
Rahmat! Men san'at haqida jurnallar ham o'qiyman.
U musiqa jurnallarini o'qishni yaxshi ko'radi.
Mening kitob javonimda moda jurnallari bor.
